title: Pentakill Karthus taunts muted
body: I pretty much bought pentakill karthus cause of the taunt animations, also I frequently play the champ itself. I had no problem using the taunts, but eventually I couldn't hear them anymore. I have also asked my friends if they could hear the taunts unfortunately they couldn't hear them as well. Please fix this :( I know its not my computer cause I can perfectly hear every other champ I use.

replies.body:
Hey xUtero -

Unfortunately, Karthus has been playing too many Pentakill gigs and he's lost his voice. D:

On a serious note, all of his VO on his base and skins are missing. We're working to get this resolved ASAP! Thanks for the report!
How the heck did that happen?
